name: is_valid_sudoku
description: Checks if a 9x9 Sudoku board is valid by ensuring that no row, column, or 3x3 sub-grid contains duplicate numbers (excluding empty cells represented by ".").

board.description: The Sudoku board represented as a 2D list of strings, where each string is either a digit ("1"-"9") or a dot (".") representing an empty cell.
